items: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand with a reverse grip (palms facing down).
Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and your abs engaged.
Bring the dumbbells up towards your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Pause at the top of the movement and squeeze your shoulder blades together.
Lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

content.title: Dumbbell Reverse Grip Row Form & Visual

items: Targets the brachioradialis muscle in the forearm
Can help to prevent wrist injuries
Assists in building overall arm strength and size
Can be performed with a variety of weights and equipment
